body.p: That at the present term of the Nicholas Circuit Court, a judgement was rendered against William Ricketts one of our old and most respectable Citizens, upon a forfeited recognizance which he had given for the appearance of his Son in said Court on a charge of shooting at James L. Still with intent to Kill, for the sum of Twenty five Hundred dollars.

Mr Ricketts is a man of limited means, with a verry large family. And the payment of the said judgement will greatly oppress him. And And be punishing him for the offence of a wild and reckless son who has overwhelmed him with sorrow and mortification, we his neighbors and friends respectfully ask that you will remit the said judgement.
